description:
This course is designed to give students a more solid reading level by the end
of the semester. It offers four days a week instruction. As well as gaining a
familiarity with additional vocabulary and the more complex constructions of
ancient Greek â especially those involving optative and subjunctive â
students will through their more extensive reading develop an increased
cultural knowledge in ancient Greek society and literary/ dramatic production.
title: Intermediate Ancient Greek
prerequisite:
YLG1201 Beginning Classical Greek or permission of the instructor
or
YLG2201 Intensive Elementary Greek
